name: Jordan Celton
title: Web Developer
aboutText: After several years in another field, I decided to transition to web development, specifically as a web integrator. This choice was motivated by my passion for creating websites and my desire to combine creativity and technology. Today, I take real pleasure in building intuitive, modern websites that meet user needs. Each project is an opportunity for me to learn, face new challenges, and improve my skills.
designWebText: Creation of modern and intuitive designs tailored to the needs of users and businesses.
integrationWebText: Integration of responsive websites optimized for all types of screens, using best web practices.
developmentFrontEndText: Development of the user interface, ensuring a smooth and pleasant experience for visitors.
optimizationPerformanceText: Improvement of website speed and performance for fast and seamless navigation.

educationList.description: Intensive Web Integrator training, learning front-end and back-end technologies, and completing several concrete projects.

educationList.degree: Technical Baccalaureate in Machining - Lycée Le Likes
educationList.description: Obtained the Technical Baccalaureate with a specialization in machining techniques at Lycée Le Likes, developing skills in programming and industrial manufacturing.

experienceList.description: Developing websites and applications for clients across various sectors, using modern technologies like HTML, CSS, JavaScript, and React.

bookiDescription:
Creation of the homepage for a travel agency with a responsive interface using HTML5 and CSS3. Integration of Figma mockups and development of custom components for an optimal user experience.
Link to the project: https://github.com/Jordan-celton/P3
ohmyfoodDescription:
Learning objectives: mobile-first design, implementation of CSS animations, using Sass for maintainable code, and versioning with Git and GitHub.
Link to the project: https://github.com/Jordan-celton/P4
sophiebluelDescription:
Development of a dynamic webpage for an interior architect's site using JavaScript. Interaction with an API, creating dynamic pages, and using tools like Figma and Visual Studio Code.
Link to the project: https://github.com/Jordan-celton/P6
kasaDescription:
Implementation of the front-end of an application with React and React Router. Component development, navigation management, and using simulated data from a JSON file.
Link to the project: https://github.com/Jordan-celton/P7
ninaCarducciDescription:
SEO optimization of a website by improving its performance and accessibility. Analysis of issues, implementation of improvements, and creating a report detailing the before/after results.
Link to the project: https://github.com/Jordan-celton/P8
eventsDescription:
Debugging and finalizing a one-page site. Code analysis, bug resolution with Chrome DevTools and React Developer Tools, documenting tests, and project management with Yarn.
Link to the project: https://github.com/Jordan-celton/P9
argentBankDescription:
Development of the front-end of a banking application with React and Redux. API calls integration, creation of a responsive user interface, and state management with Redux.
Link to the project: https://github.com/Jordan-celton/P10
qwentaDescription:
Development of the **Menu Maker - Qwenta** project, an online tool for creating and customizing menus for restaurateurs.
Link to the project: https://github.com/Jordan-celton/P11
